ai: The note [[如何给孩子早教（0-5岁）]] discusses early childhood education for children aged 0-5. It highlights that O’Reilly Media is not a suitable platform for this topic as it focuses on technology books. The note identifies two useful books from a provided playlist: “Make: Math Teacher’s Supplement” for teaching strategies and “Math 100 Ideas in 100 Words” for simple math concepts.
